name: TheScungilliMan
description:
The Scungilli Man was created by Henry Zebrowski on the podcast Last Podcast On The Left, Episode 418: The Slenderman Enigma. I expanded the lore in order to make it into a game. There are 3 different endings.

Please do not attempt to replicate anything in this game. Inviting the Scungilli man into your life will have unforeseen consequences. I started making this game as a goof, but now I regret it. The Scungilli man took 9 days to make, more than 150 hours. It has consumed me. What started as a joke became a feeding ground for this cryptid. I barely survived the experience.

Besides that, it was fun to make and I hope you like it. There's a lot of stuff I had to cut out, so if you want me to keep developing the game, we need the blessings of the creator first. Twitter @HenryLovesYou

Thanks to Last Podcast on the Left for providing the world, and me, countless hours of entertainment. A lot of us are struggling to make ends meet, and the future doesn't look great.  For me, this podcast has been a reliable comfort in a time of uncertainty.

Special thanks to these asset creators
